name: Secret Dream
description:
Olivia, a girl who dreams of seeing herself and her friend die. 

And it actually happened as she dreamed. She tries hard to avoid it and keep her friends alive.

Can Olivia do it? Or will it end in death?

*****************************************************

If you found some error or bug, Please let me know! I will fix it asap.

PLEASE COMMENT AND RATING ME,  IF YOU LIKE MY GAME!

Thank you very much.
